Improvements.Improvement: Extract the code for copying the properties from newBean to config into a separate method
Improvements.Description: There are multiple properties being copied from newBean to config. This code could be encapsulated into a separate method for better readability and reusability.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract the code for reverting the properties of config into a separate method
Improvements.Description: The code for reverting the properties of config in case of failure could be encapsulated into a separate method for better readability and reusability.
